review: I bought this for my parents because they aren't very good with technology and I figured a chromecast like device that had a user interface and a remote would be perfect for them. While this is true, the Fire TV Stick is not all I'd hoped it would be. Terrible product name aside, the device has worked well besides a couple of things:1. It runs on apps off the amazon android appstore. For example, Plex has to be purchased in order to be used, along with any other service you hope to use that costs money on the amazon android appstore2. I've had a couple of stability problems, for example with plex the movie will often freeze, crash, and then continue playing where it left off at least once a movie. I don't have this problem on any other device3. The TV automatically changes input to the fire stick whenever it is plugged in. This means I have to either unplug it when I'm not using it, or change the input every time I turn on the TV. Not a big deal, but I really don't see why Amazon thought this would be a good idea.
